mapper.sql: select user_name, gender,type, phone_number, is_linkman,dealer_name, identity, remark, area, city, bazaar, shop_type, business_type, stall, business_nature, passenger_car, month_deal, month_installment, match_amount, detail_address, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, id, state,three_car_state,two_car_state,one_car_state from zyjr_car
mapper.select: select a.user_name,a.type, a.gender, a.phone_number, a.is_linkman,a.dealer_name, a.identity, a.remark, a.area, a.city, a.bazaar, a.shop_type, a.business_type, a.stall, a.business_nature, a.passenger_car, a.month_deal, a.month_installment, a.match_amount, a.detail_address, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.id,a.three_car_state,a.two_car_state,a.one_car_state, a.state,b.id b_id,b.account_name b_account_name, b.account_name b_account_name,b.account_use b_account_use,b.account_type b_account_type,b.account_number b_account_number,b.account_city b_account_city,b.account_sub_branch b_account_sub_branch, c.file_name c_file_name,c.file_path c_file_path,c.file_id c_file_id from zyjr_car a LEFT JOIN zyjr_car_account b on a.id=b.zyjr_car_id LEFT JOIN sys_file_info c on a.id=c.id where a.id = #{id} order by b_id
mapper.insert:

update zyjr_car
user_name = #{userName}, gender = #{gender}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, is_linkman = #{isLinkman}, identity = #{identity}, remark = #{remark}, area = #{area}, city = #{city}, bazaar = #{bazaar}, shop_type = #{shopType}, business_type = #{businessType}, stall = #{stall}, business_nature = #{businessNature}, passenger_car = #{passengerCar}, month_deal = #{monthDeal}, month_installment = #{monthInstallment}, match_amount = #{matchAmount}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, type = #{type},
create_by = #{createBy}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime}, state = #{state}, dealer_name = #{dealerName}, three_car_state = #{threeCarState}, two_car_state = #{twoCarState}, one_car_state = #{oneCarState},
where id = #{id}
